15 dBm @ 2.4 GHz, OFDM 54Mbps
18 dBm @ 2.4 GHz, CCK 11Mbps receiver sensitivity -70 dBm @ 54 Mbps (OFDM, 10% PER)
-86 dBm @ 11 Mbps (CCK, 8% PER) "3751-38210003R" is silkscreened on the board. Cisco FCC ID of Q87-WM821M [[Category:English Documentation]]
